item.title: My Journey from NAND to tetris
item.description: NOTE: This will be a series of writings which is related to core computer science Nand to Tetris is a course designed by two Israeli computers geeks Noam Nisan and Simon Schocken. This module is produced by a bunch of computer enthusiasts and tought all over the world on demand. This is a quite good way to start learning about computer systems from the scratch. As the name suggest it starts with basics of Electronics and gradually end with building a proper computer system.
